event.title: The FSFE with an assembly at the Chaos Communication Camp 34C3 in Leipzig, Germany

body.p: As in previous years, the FSFE will be present with an assembly during the Chaos Communication Camp from December 26 to 30. More details will follow. Currently we are running our call for sessions, if you are interested to participate, check the news-item: https://fsfe.org/news/2017/news-20171024-01.en.html
